attributes.action: Publish to report into peers who do not attend but claim expenses.
attributes.background: Baroness de Souza says she has stopped the investigation into peers who claim the £300 per day allowance but do not attend for fear of a press and public outcry. This is tantamount to condoning this behaviour and the report should be published and the errant peers named and shamed.

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions about matters that the Government or the House of Commons are responsible for. We can't accept petitions calling on the House of Lords to take action.
